com.zepl.challenge.dao

Class ToDoDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zepl.challenge.dao.ToDoDao

  • public class ToDoDao
extends java.lang.Object
    H2 In-Memory Database Example shows about storing the database contents into memory. Todos and Tasks will be stored into the embedded H2 Database. In case of restarting the service can recovered the list of todos and tasks.
